title: Scatterheart
description: The turnkey pushed Hannah into the cell, and clanged the door shut behind her. Hannahâ€™s eyes stung and she felt a heavy churning in her belly. The smell of urine, vomit, sweat and rotting flesh was overpowering, and she broke out in a hot, prickly sweat, despite the icy night.1814, London Town. Hannah Cheshire - wealthy and spoiled - has fallen from grace. Punishment: transportation to the colony of New South Wales.
author: Lili Wilkinson
